website_summaries.verdict: A collection of uniquely lovely scents inspired by world gardens and brought to you by a high-fashion luxury brand. Suitable for all year long but especially refreshing to wear in the spring and summer months.
pros: A set of four travel-size bottles with scents of gardens from around the world
Notes include floral, herbal, and citrus
These fragrances earn praise for smelling fresh and clean
A few drops go a long way, and scents linger for hours
Packaging is attractive and worthy of gift-giving
cons: Scents would be easier to apply if they came in spray bottles, but this isn't a deal-breaker

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Hermes. THis is a nice set to get an idea of scents. If you really like one-suggest to upgrade to the parfume - will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: The sents are remarkable. Box is very sturdy and is authentic. Might have to buy one for myself. Very nice package. Twilly is my favorite. Holidays on a budget buyer.
customer_reviews.author: CM94

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves it, she said they all smell so great. She couldn’t have chosen just one so she’s glad to have all four. They are small but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are tiny but smell so good.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packaging. Only two of them I would wear. But I still think it's a good way to try perfume before buying a big bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for these scents after receiving a sample bottle in tge 2000's. My all time favorite. Fresh, clean and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift set. A little of everything. Only complaint: these little cute bottles are hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Loved Them!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my girl who is a perfume collector.
customer_reviews.author: In touch

customer_reviews.title: this is a good way to sample the product I once purchase something ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a good way to sample the product I once purchase something from Hermes and didn't like it at all but this sampler is awesome I would buy the larger bottles of each miniature they all smell extremely good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great opportunity to try many wonderful Hermes frangrances
customer_reviews.text: Love this! You get to try all the wonderful of frangrances for the price of one.
customer_reviews.author: Gala B

customer_reviews.title: ... case and when I received it I was somewhat disappointed over what was provided
customer_reviews.text: It was very hard to figure out what actually came with this case and when I received it I was somewhat disappointed over what was provided.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Weisbart

customer_reviews.title: Some sets are Hermes brand and some are Hermes-inspired imitation sets.
customer_reviews.text: So, there are a few trial-sized sets being sold here on the same Amazon page. Note that this Variety I is all “inspired by” H and not actual H products. :/ Also note that flammable liquids like this are not returnable, even if it is an Amazon Prime eligible item.
customer_reviews.author: Judge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice of fragrances in a sampler
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed mine, sent to my sister as a gift. Beautiful packing, difficult to open two of the sample bottles, resulting in waste/spill - looks great but not practical to open glass bottles. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: dianaskylark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the women you love! Including you!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this for myself in the airport in Paris. I'd never seen it before and loved it. When I got back to the states, I wanted to purchase some as gifts, so I searched Amazon and of course they were available. Perfect gift. The bottles are mini, which is perfect for me because I never use the whole bottle. I got a bunch for Mother's Day! I would recommend this. I haven't tried all the scents but the ones I have used smell great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Stocking Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Nice good size samples perfect for Christmas gifts. Good if you have spoiled rich bitch snobby daughters that would turn their nose up at anything less than Hermes'. You know they are all going to smell great.
customer_reviews.author: Vespasion

product_meta.title: Hermes Un Jardin Eau de Toilette Mini Fragrance 4-Piece Set
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Variety IDiscover the tranquil and exotic side of HERMÈS with this set of four travel-size fragrances inspired by gardens from around the world. Un Jardin en Mediterranée is a narrative novel, a travel log that tells the spirit of a Mediterranean secret garden where trees and flowers a mosaic of warm and soft scents abound.
feature_bullets: Hermes Un Jardin En Mediterranee Eau de Toilette Mini Splash, 0.25 Ounce
Hermes Un Jardin Sur Le Nil Eau de Toilette Mini Splash, 0.25 Ounce

Hermes Un Jardin de Monsieur Li Eau de Toilette Mini Splash, 0.25 Ounce
